//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ INSERT )
{
	set ( "SET_STRING_PACKAGE", "COL10" );
	use ( "scientist01" );
	use ( "scientist02" );
	use ( "chemguy02" );
	use ( "t40" );
	wait ( 100.000 );

	affect ( "scientist01", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
	{
		set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "ON" );
		set ( "SET_SEARCH_OFF", "ON" );
	}


	affect ( "scientist02", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
	{
		set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "ON" );
		set ( "SET_SEARCH_OFF", "ON" );
	}

}
